entry.title: Ocean Jewel - Bay Scallops 60-150 Count - 400g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ocean Jewel
Type: FOOD
Price: 10.99

Ocean Jewel - 60/150 Bay Scallops - 400g - SF01466

Create delicious appetizers and entrees with a rich seafood flavor by using wholesale scallops in your recipes. These products have a succulent texture combined with a buttery and flavorful taste, making them an excellent ingredient to use in your seafood restaurant. You can also prepare scallops in a variety of different ways, such a sauteing, baking, grilling, or steaming, allowing you to choose the option that best suits your menu.

Scallops are the perfect option for seafood restaurants, and they are commonly found on fine dining menus, making them an excellent choice for catering businesses, hotels, and other upscale establishments. Our wholesale scallops are fresh, and you can use them immediately or freeze them to prolong their shelf life. Additionally, scallops are high in protein and flavor, but they are low in fat, making them an ideal choice for health-conscious customers that are looking for lean seafood options.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Mrs. Fridays
Type: FOOD
Price: 94.99

Mrs. Fridays - Uncooked Unbreaded Krabbycakes 2.25 Oz Oven Ready - 10 Lbs

Great for restaurants, catering companies, and institutions, crab meat is a versatile ingredient that you can incorporate into an array of starters, side dishes, and entrees. We offer wholesale crab meat in several varieties, so you can find the type of crab that you most prefer. Additionally, you can choose lump crab meat that is perfect for making crab cakes and incorporating with pasta dishes, or select claw meat for a finer texture that is excellent for soups and sauces.

If you want to incorporate crab into the menu at your restaurant or catered event, wholesale crab meat is a versatile option. Select from several crab varieties to find the perfect taste for your unique menu items. Plus, we carry crab meat in bulk quantities to accommodate high-volume establishments like schools and other institutions.

9 x 8 Count Crab Cakes

entry.title: Aquastar - Jonah Crab Claws Triple Scored - 1 Lb
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aquastar
Type: FOOD
Price: 14.99

Aquastar - Jonah Crab Claws Triple Scored - 454 g

Jonah Crab is famous for its bright orange shell and large claws filled with rich, sweet meat with a delicate texture. Wild caught off the coast of the northern Atlantic Ocean, our Jonah Crab Claws are fully cooked and ready to thaw and serve. Each claw is triple scored for easy access to the succulent meat inside.
- Triple Scored
- Fully Cooked
- Wild

Atlantic Canada - Lobster Meat Claws Knuckle Tin - 11.03 Oz

If you run a seafood-serving establishment, wholesale crawfish and lobster tails are sure to please your guests. Wholesale lobster tails boast a firm and hearty texture with a sweet, delicate flavor to balance it out. Lobster by itself can suffice as a rich entree, or try creating a lobster macaroni and cheese for your young guests.

Whether you operate a seafood restaurant or want to feature lobster and crawfish on your menu, we have a large selection of wholesale crawfish and lobster that are fit for your needs. Both crawfish and our wholesale lobster have a firm, rich texture and a sweet, delicate flavor that will delight your guests. We carry lobster and crawfish in different package sizes, so you can choose the ideal amount for your restaurant’s needs.

entry.title: Toppits - Firecracker Infused Calamari Bites - 454 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toppits
Type: FOOD
Price: 10.99

Toppits - Firecracker Infused Calamari Bites - 454 g

Deliciously crispy and perfectly seasoned, breaded calamari rings are the perfect balance of crispy and juicy. Each bite crunches through the breading and sinks into the tender, juicy meat for a truly mouthwatering experience. Plus, the spices add incredible depth to the squid, which complements the meat's natural, fresh taste.

Add this calamari to your menu with an assortment of popular dipping sauces, from cocktail sauce and ketchup to sweet honey mustard. It makes for a great-tasting appetizer or game-day dish!

entry.title: Toppits - Sea Salt & Peppercorn Calamari Bites - 2 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toppits
Type: FOOD
Price: 19.99

Toppits - Sea Salt & Peppercorn Calamari Bites - 2 lbs

Feature & Benefits:

  • Wild-Caught

  • Crunchy Premium Coating

  • Naturally Tender Squid

  • Mild, Sweet Flavour

  • Cook from Frozen

  • Ready to Serve 

Sea Salt & Pepper Ingredients: Squid, Wheat Flour, Water, Canola Oil, Distarch Phosphate, Sugar, Salt, Pepper, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Yeast Extract, Spices, Soya Sauce Powder (Soybean, Salt, Wheat Flour, Water), Celery Seed, Spice Extract.

Dynamite Ingredients: Squid, Wheat Flour, Water, Canola Oil, Modified Corn Starch, Modified Tapioca Starch, Chili Pepper Flakes, Sugar, Salt, Garlic, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Paprika, Egg White Powder, Hydrolysed Soy Protein, Flavour, Paprika Extract.

Thawing Instructions:

Thaw product in refrigerator overnight. Do not refreeze.

Cooking Instructions:

Deep Fry: Preheat oil to 180°C (356ºF). Deep fry frozen squid for 3 – 4 minutes or until golden brown.

Conventional Oven: Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F). Place frozen squid on a pre-heated baking rack and back for 24-26 minutes or until golden brown, turning over halfway through cooking. 

Cook to an internal temperature of 74°C (165°F).

Pack(s):

454 g

Toppits - Top Breaded Calamari Rings - 2 Lbs

entry.title: Toppits - Squid Tubes & Tentacles - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toppits
Type: FOOD
Price: 174.99

Toppits - Squid Tubes & Tentacles - 10 Kg

Add new and exciting dishes to your menu with this squid tubes and tentacles. The squid features a slightly chewy yet firm texture that is typical of squid, with a subtly sweet, mild flavor. This calamari squid is packaged in bag and is part of distinctive cuisine in Italian, Asian, and seafood restaurants.

Calamari is often prepared by cutting the tentacles and slicing the tubes before breading and frying to produce a sensational appetizer. Sprinkled with salt and a quick squeeze of lemon juice, fried calamari is a crisp snack that is a staple on many menus, but this incredibly versatile food can be served in many other ways, too. Split the tube, cook it flat, and serve an irresistible calamari steak with a side of fresh vegetables. Slice the tube into rings, saute with olive oil, salt, and pepper and serve atop angel hair pasta or rice. You can even blend the tentacles together with shrimp, breadcrumbs, and seasoning and stuff the tube with the mixture for a savory dish that is sure to delight.

entry.title: Toppits - Loligo Squid Tubes & Tentacles - 2.5 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toppits
Type: FOOD
Price: 22.49

Toppits - Loligo Squid Tubes & Tentacles - 2.5 Lbs

With its white tube and purple tentacles, Toppits Loligo Squid is hard to miss. Featuring a sweet, subtle bite, this squid is not only low in fat and saturated fatty acids, but also a source of Vitamin C. Available in Tubes, Tubes & Tentacles, or Rings & Tentacles, Toppits has your squid needs covered.

Furthermore, our portion pouch packs (rings & tentacles) eliminate product waste and the need for skilled labour. If you’re thinking calamari, start thinking Toppits Loligo Squid.

Features & Benefits:

  • Tender white flesh and purple tentacles create a beautiful plate presentation

  • Mild flavour profile with a subtle sweetness makes it a great introduction for new seafood consumers

  • Convenient rings &tentacles pouch allow for 100% yield and portion control as well as eliminating the need for skilled labour

​
